title: Tidy Tuesday 3: Registered Nurses
description: This post will explore visualizations utilizing a dataset on Registered Nurses in the U.S. and their wages.
contents:
Visualizations
 As per the Bureau of Labor Statistics website, the five states of California, Texas, New York, Florida and Pennsylvania have the highest level of employment for Registered Nurses. It will be interesting to see how wages have been increasing in these states across the decades as well as in comparison to each other.



 Using the nurses dataset, I wanted to understand how salary for nurses vary across different geographical regions in the U.S. In the visualization below, we can observe that California has the highest annual salary followed by other States such as Washington, Oregon, Arizona, Texas and Colorado. Most states on the East Coast have relatovely lower annual average salaries for Registered Nurses.

title: Tidy Tuesday 2
description: This post will explore how features / characteristics of music production affect their popularity on Spotify
contents:
Loading Library


library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)



Loading dataset


audio_features <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-09-14/audio_features.csv')



Data Visualization


 Audio <- audio_features %>% 
          filter(performer %in% c("Drake", "Beyonce", "Polo G", "Ariana Grande")) %>%
          group_by(performer) %>%
          select(spotify_track_popularity, danceability)

Audio %>% ggplot(aes(x = danceability, y = spotify_track_popularity)) + geom_smooth(method = lm) + 
          labs(title = "The Relationship Between Popularity and Danceability on Spotify",
                    x = "Danceability",
                    y = "Popularity",
                    caption = " Source: Tshering Wangchuk, Macalester College") + 
          theme_clean()




 The goal of using this dataset was to obersve characteristics / features of music that increased itâ€™s popularity on Spotify. I selected four artists that have a large following among the younger generation and the plot displays that the chances of a song being liked on spotify is positively correlated with danceability.

title: Assignment 1: Github and Websites
description: This post will explore the basics of setting up GitHub and creating websites using RStudio.
contents:
Description
 This objective of this blog post is to learn how to set up a website using R (distill). The post is the first of many, as I begin documenting my R work and portfolio under the guidance of Professor Lisa Lendway in the coming months.
